explains: n. （一国经济的）不景气，停滞；（水）不流动

sentences.en: Stagnation in home sales is holding back economic recovery.
sentences.cn: 住房销售的停滞正阻碍着经济的复苏。

sentences.en: We learned about stagnation from nature.
sentences.cn: 我们从自然中学到了停滞。

sentences.en: Lengthy periods of economic stagnation or decline have almost always left society more mean-spirited and less inclusive, and have usually stopped or reversed the advance of rights and freedoms.
sentences.cn: 长期的经济停滞或衰退几乎总是使社会变得更加刻薄、更缺乏包容性，通常还会阻止或逆转权利和自由的进步。
